title: Comparative analysis of senolytic drugs reveals mitochondrial determinants of efficacy and resistance
summary: Nature Aging, Published online: 29 January 2026; doi:10.1038/s43587-025-01057-zWakita et al. systematically compare the efficacy of 21 senolytics and identify a subpopulation of senolytic-resistant cells. They demonstrate a mitochondrial basis of senolytic resistance and show that metabolic interventions enhance senescent cell clearance in vivo.
author: Masahiro Wakita
